data.oai_dc:dc: Field data Gryseels et al. Rodent urban-rural genetic contrast

Explanations for datafile "Field data Gryseels et al. Differentiation of M.natalensis in synanthropy.xls"This datafile contains trapping and location information of small mammals captured as described in the manuscript "Genetic distinction between contiguous urban and rural multimammate mice in Tanzania despite gene flow"ID: Unique ID code of each captured animalProject: the samples used in the manuscript originate from 2 different projects (see details in manuscript)Locality: Unique code of the locality (which consists of a set of 100 traps placed in a grid for 1 night) where the animal is capturedTown: town, village or community where the animal is capturedDate: the date the animal was capturedSpecies: morphological identification of the animal (in case of Mastomys natalensis: confirmed by cytochrome b DNA sequence data)Latitude and longitude: the exact GPS location the animal was captured inside its trap
